channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lamppost 37 not working, 21st October
item.description:
Opposite 91 Caernarvon road. The streetlight is not working for some time now. It’s number 37. Thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 82 Caernarvon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tyre, 21st October
item.description:
A big pile of tyres has been abandoned in the gateway (Cheltenham side of the motorway bridge)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road gulley drain blocked, 20th October
item.description:
This gulley drain has been blocked for years. The road around it floods during periods of rain. Simply needs cleaning out.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 55 Alstone Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Significantly overgrown hedgerow leading to narrow footpath, 20th October
item.description:
The hedgerow alongside this footpath appears to have grown over the footpath significantly, meaning the footpath is now only wide enough for one person. This means that pedestrians often have to step into the busy A46 to pass someone coming the other way. It looks like the hedge and undergrowth have not been cut back for a number of years.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Parcel 6335 Shurdington Road, Shurdington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mud slipping into road again, 20th October
item.description:
Mud is slipping off the bank into the road causing a hazard. Please could this be cleaned up and the road sorted as it happens every year. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Green Dragon Inn A435 COWLEY VILLAGE JUNCTION TO COLESBOURNE JUNCTION||||0|0|, Cowley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti and tagging in the Tunnel at Edinburgh place, 20th October
item.description:
We have an incident of graffiti and tagging with offensive language and phone numbers in the tunnel at Edinburgh place. Please can somebody clean it up

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 53 Edinburgh Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ambiguous new road markings, 20th October
item.description:
New road markings - When approaching roundabout from Lansdown the left lane is left turn only and right lane is straight on/right turn. The roundabout itself has two lanes - but who would ever be in that left hand lane (on roundabout)? If turning left, you would turn left and if going straight on or right you would be in right hand lane? It is bizarre and, I think dangerous, as encourages those approAching from Montpellier Walk to pull into left hand lane just as those coming from Lansdown are changing into the left hand lane to go straight on / right. Sorry this sounds complicated but obvious when you are actually there!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Montpellier Terrace, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 62 Alstone Avenue, Cheltenham

item.title: Marked Pothole not fixed, 15th October
item.description:
I recently opened a ticket regarding pot holes that were marked for repair months ago, that haven't been fixed. You immediately closed this saying work had been done. It hasn't. There are still marked potholes that haven't been fixed. They are on prestbury rd on the lane leading from the roundabout going towards prestbury.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 40 Prestbury Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
